meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>remainder</kanji> of time that you work at the ol' <kanji>business</kanji> is extra time that you're working (above the normal work hours). This is <vocabulary>overtime</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
